channel.title: I just don't see the craze about COD
channel.description:
I just don't get what the fuss is about COD! It's just another MMOFPS! I just think it's a letdown compared to other games developed by better engines.
I dont find it that fun, i dislike the graphics and the Nazi Zombies or whatever was ripped from CA
Combat Arms = Unreal Tourmanent 3 > COD

item.title: I just don't see the craze about COD
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:45, topic:336719”][quote author=Frell link=topic=433129.msg3182915#msg3182915 date=1271476446]

I think that assasins creed is fucking leet

Wtf does that have to do with this topic? It’s not even an fps…

ROFLED…

COD6 is fucking let down…

No such thing as cod6 you fucktard.
[/quote]MW2 pl0x

it seems WaW is overlooked a lot <.<

THERES SUCH THING AS MW2, THERES NO SUCH THING AS COD 6.

Call of Duty: ModernWarfare 2?[/quote]
Thank you. I hate when people call WAW cod 5 and MW2 cod 6, theres is no 5 or 6 in either of the titles so it cannot be called that.

Read full topic
item.source: I just don't see the craze about COD

item.title: I just don't see the craze about COD
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:31, topic:336719”][img]http://www.keyghost.com/usb%20keylogger/keyghost-usb-extension.jpg[/ img]
Weapon:Usb cord
Type:Knife replacement
Level unlock:70
Reason for being better:Reaches farther, you can throw it (seperate from throwing USB flash drives), you can plug it into the random computers in the game, camp, and then blow em up.
Why it’s worse: Doesn’t kill opponent 20% of time, slightly slower then standard knife with SMG.

USB throwers:[img]http://www.keyghost.com/usb%20keylogger/KeyGhost-USB-512KB-Plugs.jpg[ /img][/quote]LMAO, This made my day.

Read full topic

item.title: I just don't see the craze about COD
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:29, topic:336719”][quote author=whip of soulz link=topic=433129.msg3180509#msg3180509 date=1271268005]

COD is a great game. It takes no skill that is why people play it.

Just get this setup:- (THIS SETUP IS FOR BEGINNERS THEREFOR DOES NOT USE GOOD PERKS.)
Primary: UMP45
Secondary: Spas-12/PP2000/USB (Pistol)
Equipment: Semtex
Special Grenade: Flashbang/Stun Grenade
Perk 1: Marathon
Perk 2: Stopping Power
Perk 3: Commando

NOW RUN IN THERE LIKE A MAN AND SHANK EVERYBODY.
[/quote]What The fuck is a usb?

FEEL THE PAIN OF MY USB CORD smacks opponent with cord[/quote]
yh that gun has a cord lmao. probs used to dildo biatches.

Read full topic
